title: Looking for people to play with
body: Im after people to play ranked with at all times. i dont really play norms, only ranked. Ive just carried myself from being placed in b4 up into s5 now. Amumu Jungle main

replies.body:
Add me. ;)
I'm a Mid/Top main. Mostly play the hard carry champs like Yasuo and Darius. I'm Bronze 3. Climbing slowly as I can only play on weekends. I'm Still in school.
I currently am a bronze 2 support main, I just started climbing and have climbed from b4, 0lp to b2 18lp. Hit me up if you are keen.
